Return statistics about a field for a given sequence ID

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Sequence ID","in":"path","name":"seq_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"field":{"type":"string"},"sqon":{"properties":{"content":{"oneOf":[{"properties":{"field":{"type":"string"},"value":{"items":{},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false}},"type":"object","title":"LeafContent"},{"items":"circular(Sqon)","type":"array"}]},"id":{"type":"string"},"op":{"enum":["in","and","or","not","between",">","<",">=","<=","not-in","all"],"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"Sqon"}},"type":"object","title":"StatisticsBodyWithSqon"}}},"description":"Statistics Body","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
